hero_subtitle: JEOAH'S is the all-in-one platform that connects sellers, affiliates, and buyers for explosive growth. Launch your shop, find the best products, and maximize your revenue.
launch_offer_text: The first 25 members get exclusive benefits. Join us now!
features_subtitle: Discover how JEOAH'S helps you achieve your goals, whether you are a seller, an affiliate, or a buyer.
feature_sellers_text: Launch your shop in just a few clicks. Import your products, manage your inventory, and track your sales from a unified dashboard. Reach a new audience through our affiliate network.
feature_affiliates_text: Monetize your audience. Access a catalog of quality products, generate your unique affiliate links, and track your commissions in real-time. Simple tools for passive income.
feature_buyers_text: Discover and buy unique, quality products recommended by trusted creators. A smooth, secure, and centralized shopping experience.
features_subtitle_page: Discover everything JEOAH'S can do for you.
feature_sellers_text_extended: Launch your store in a few clicks. Upload your products (up to 3 photos per item), manage your inventory, and connect your social networks. Reach a new audience through our powerful affiliate network.
feature_affiliates_text_extended: Monetize your audience. Add your external affiliate links (up to 10) and share our sellers' products to earn commissions. Simple tools for passive income and real-time tracking.
pricing_subtitle: Whether you're just starting out or are an established seller, we have the right plan for you. Cancel anytime.
referral_text_1: Invite your friends, colleagues, and audience to join JEOAH'S. For every group of 25 referrals who subscribe to a paid plan, you earn a 10% commission.
referral_text_2: Copy your unique link and start building your network today.
referral_cta_placeholder: Your referral link will appear here...
faq_subtitle: Got questions? We have the answers.
faq_1_a: JEOAH'S is an all-in-one platform that serves as an ecosystem for sellers, affiliates, and buyers. Sellers can create their own online store, affiliates can promote products to earn commissions, and buyers can discover trusted products in one place.
faq_2_q: Do I have to pay to sign up?
faq_2_a: Signing up on JEOAH'S is free! You can create an account, explore the platform, and participate in the referral program without a subscription. A paid subscription is required to unlock selling features (for sellers) and to withdraw referral commissions.
faq_3_q: How does the referral program work?
faq_3_a: Each member receives a unique referral link. When you refer new users and a group of 25 of them subscribes to a paid plan, you earn a 10% commission. To withdraw your earnings, you must have an active subscription, but you can start accumulating referrals from the moment you sign up for free.
faq_4_q: What types of products can I sell?
faq_4_a: You can sell a wide variety of products, both physical and digital. We ask that you comply with our terms of use regarding prohibited products. Flexibility is at the core of our platform to allow every seller to find their market.
faq_5_q: How do I get paid as an affiliate or seller?
faq_5_a: Payments for sales and commissions are processed through secure platforms like Stripe and PayPal. You can configure your payment preferences in your dashboard and track all your income in real-time.

contact_subtitle: A question? A suggestion? Don't hesitate.
onboarding_links_subtitle: Enter up to 10 of your external affiliate links (e.g., Amazon, AliExpress...). This helps us understand the products you love.
about_subtitle: At JEOAH'S, we believe in the power of connection. Our goal is to create the simplest, most powerful ecosystem for web entrepreneurs.
about_paragraph_1: JEOAH'S was born from a simple observation: the tools to sell online, promote products, or simply shop with confidence are scattered, complex, and often expensive. We wanted to create a single solution that brings everyone together: product creators, those with an audience, and those looking for quality products.
about_paragraph_2: Our platform is designed to be intuitive, flexible, and powerful. Whether you are a seller launching your first store, an affiliate looking to monetize your content, or a buyer in search of discoveries, JEOAH'S gives you the tools to succeed, without the technical complexity.
about_paragraph_3: We are more than just technology. We are a community. By joining JEOAH'S, you enter a network of mutual support where everyone's growth benefits everyone. Welcome to the adventure.
showcase_subtitle: Discover unique products from our community of sellers and affiliates.
